public ref class Enumerable abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一組 (在 Visual Basic 中為 ) 方法，用於查詢實作 的物件。

span.span: Provides a set of ( in Visual Basic) methods for querying objects that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別中的方法提供實作標準查詢運算子的查詢資料來源實作。The methods in this class provide an implementation of the standard query operators for querying data sources that implement . 標準查詢運算子是一般用途的方法，請遵循[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]模式，並讓您透過任何表示周遊、 篩選和投射作業。以網路為基礎的程式設計語言。The standard query operators are general purpose methods that follow the [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] pattern and enable you to express traversal, filter, and projection operations over data in any .NET-based programming language. 這個類別中方法的大部分會定義為延伸的延伸模組方法。The majority of the methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend . 這表示您可以在實作任何物件上呼叫執行個體方法。This means they can be called like an instance method on any object that implements . 列舉查詢物件之前，傳回的值序列的查詢中使用的方法不會耗用目標資料。Methods that are used in a query that returns a sequence of values do not consume the target data until the query object is enumerated. 這稱為 「 延後執行 」。This is known as deferred execution. 傳回單一值的查詢中使用的方法會執行，並立即使用目標資料。Methods that are used in a query that returns a singleton value execute and consume the target data immediately.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可簡化透過一連串的值執行計算。The method makes it simple to perform a calculation over a sequence of values. 這個方法的運作方式是呼叫`func`中每個元素一次`source`除了第一個。This method works by calling `func` one time for each element in `source` except the first one. 每次`func`呼叫時，通過的項目從序列和彙總的值 (做為第一個引數`func`)。Each time `func` is called, passes both the element from the sequence and an aggregated value (as the first argument to `func`). 第一個項目`source`做為初始彙總的值。The first element of `source` is used as the initial aggregate value. 結果`func`會取代先前的彙的總值。The result of `func` replaces the previous aggregated value. 傳回的最終結果`func`。 returns the final result of `func`. 這個多載方法不適合所有情況下，因為它會使用第一個項目`source`做為初始彙總的值。This overload of the method isn't suitable for all cases because it uses the first element of `source` as the initial aggregate value. 如果傳回的值應該包含的項目，您應選擇另一個多載`source`符合特定條件。You should choose another overload if the return value should include only the elements of `source` that meet a certain condition. 例如，這個多載不可靠，如果您想要計算中的偶數`source`。For example, this overload isn't reliable if you want to calculate the sum of the even numbers in `source`. 結果會是不正確，如果第一個項目是奇數，而不是即使。The result will be incorrect if the first element is odd instead of even. 若要簡化常見的彙總作業，標準查詢運算子也包含一般用途計數方法，和四個數值彙總方法，也就是， ， ，和。To simplify common aggregation operations, the standard query operators also include a general purpose count method, , and four numeric aggregation methods, namely , , , and . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何藉由使用反轉字串中的字詞的順序。The following code example demonstrates how to reverse the order of words in a string by using . [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個方法不會傳回集合的所有項目。This method does not return all the elements of a collection. 相反地，它會判斷集合中的所有項目是否符合條件。Instead, it determines whether all the elements of a collection satisfy a condition. 列舉`source`可以判斷結果為已停止。The enumeration of `source` is stopped as soon as the result can be determined. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查詢運算式語法`Aggregate Into All()`子句的引動過程轉譯。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, an `Aggregate Into All()` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來判斷序列中的所有項目是否符合條件。The following code example demonstrates how to use to determine whether all the elements in a sequence satisfy a condition. 變數`allStartWithB`成立如果所有寵物名稱都開頭為"B"，或如果`pets`陣列是空的。Variable `allStartWithB` is true if all the pet names start with "B" or if the `pets` array is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法沒有任何作用以外變更編譯時間類型的`source`從型別可實作至本身。The method has no effect other than to change the compile-time type of `source` from a type that implements to itself. 可用於查詢實作，當序列實作之間選擇但也有一組不同的可用查詢的公用方法。 can be used to choose between query implementations when a sequence implements but also has a different set of public query methods available. 例如，假設泛型類別`Table`實作和有它自己的方法，例如`Where`， `Select`，和`SelectMany`，呼叫`Where`會叫用公用`Where`方法`Table`.For example, given a generic class `Table` that implements and has its own methods such as `Where`, `Select`, and `SelectMany`, a call to `Where` would invoke the public `Where` method of `Table`. A`Table`代表資料庫資料表類型可能會有`Where`方法會採用述詞的引數，做為運算式樹狀架構，並將樹狀目錄轉換成 SQL，遠端執行。A `Table` type that represents a database table could have a `Where` method that takes the predicate argument as an expression tree and converts the tree to SQL for remote execution. 如果遠端執行不需要，例如因為述詞會叫用的本機方法，方法可以用來隱藏自訂方法，並改為提供的標準查詢運算子。If remote execution is not desired, for example because the predicate invokes a local method, the method can be used to hide the custom methods and instead make the standard query operators available. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用隱藏類型的自訂`Where`時想要使用標準查詢運算子的實作方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use to hide a type's custom `Where` method when the standard query operator implementation is desired. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#108)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#108)]

summary.span: 計算數值序列的平均值。

span.span: Computes the average of a sequence of numeric values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 方法可讓標準查詢運算子，以叫用非泛型集合上所提供的必要型別資訊。The method enables the standard query operators to be invoked on non-generic collections by supplying the necessary type information. 例如，未實作，但藉由呼叫上物件的標準查詢運算子可以再用來查詢的順序。For example, does not implement , but by calling on the object, the standard query operators can then be used to query the sequence. 如果項目無法轉換成輸入`TResult`，這個方法會擲回。If an element cannot be converted to type `TResult`, this method throws a . 來源序列，此方法是，表示項目都具有的編譯時期靜態類型`object`。The source sequence for this method is , which means the elements have the compile-time static type of `object`. 這個方法所執行的唯一類型轉換為參考轉換和 unboxing 轉換。The only type conversions that are performed by this method are reference conversions and unboxing conversions. 執行階段類型的集合中的項目必須符合目標類型，或如果實值類型的項目執行階段型別必須是目標類型的 boxing 轉換的結果。The runtime type of the elements in the collection must match the target type, or in the case of value types, the runtime type of elements must be the result of a boxing conversion of the target type. 不允許其他轉換類型，例如不同的數值類型。Other conversion types, such as those between different numeric types, are not allowed. 若要取得可以轉換成輸入這些項目`TResult`，使用方法，而非。To obtain only those elements that can be converted to type `TResult`, use the method instead of . 在查詢運算式中，明確指定型別的的反覆運算變數則會轉譯為的引動過程。In a query expression, an explicitly typed iteration variable translates to an invocation of . 這個範例會顯示明確指定型別的的範圍變數的語法。This example shows the syntax for an explicitly typed range variable. ```csharp from int i in objects ``` ```vb From i As Integer In objects ``` 使用`select`查詢來執行其他轉換類型，例如之隱含數值轉換的子句。Use the `select` clause of a query to perform other conversion types, like the implicit numeric conversions. 下列範例會使用這兩者`Cast`方法和`select`boxed 整數的序列轉換成一連串的雙精度浮點數的陳述式。The following example uses both the `Cast` method and a `select` statement to convert a sequence of boxed integers to a sequence of doubles. ```csharp IEnumerable sequence = Enumerable.Range(0, 10); var doubles = from int item in sequence select (double)item; ``` ```vb Dim sequence As IEnumerable = Enumerable.Range(0, 10) Dim doubles = From item As Integer In sequence Select CType(item, Double) ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用上啟用標準查詢運算子的用法。The following code example demonstrates how to use to enable the use of the standard query operators on an . [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#19)]

span.span: is .

exception.span: 無法將序列中的項目轉換為型別 。

span.span: An element in the sequence cannot be cast to type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果類型`source`實作、`Contains`中實作的方法會叫用來取得結果。If the type of `source` implements , the `Contains` method in that implementation is invoked to obtain the result. 否則，這個方法會判斷是否`source`包含指定的項目。Otherwise, this method determines whether `source` contains the specified element. 只要找到相符項目，列舉型別就會終止。Enumeration is terminated as soon as a matching element is found. 項目會為指定的值進行比較使用預設相等比較子， 。Elements are compared to the specified value by using the default equality comparer, . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來判斷陣列是否包含特定項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to determine whether an array contains a specific element. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 兩個集合的集合差異被定義為不會出現在第二個集合中第一個集合的成員。The set difference of two sets is defined as the members of the first set that do not appear in the second set. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法會傳回這些項目中的`first`，不會出現在`second`。This method returns those elements in `first` that do not appear in `second`. 它也不會傳回這些項目中的`second`，不會出現在`first`。It does not also return those elements in `second` that do not appear in `first`. 預設相等比較子， ，用來比較值之型別的實作泛型介面。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types that implement the generic interface. 若要比較的自訂資料類型，您需要實作這個介面，並提供您自己和類型的方法。To compare a custom data type, you need to implement this interface and provide your own and methods for the type. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來比較兩個序列的數字，並傳回項目，只會出現在第一個序列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to compare two sequences of numbers and return elements that appear only in the first sequence. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#34)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#34)] 如果您想要比較之物件的某些自訂資料類型的序列，您必須實作helperclass 中的泛型介面。If you want to compare sequences of objects of some custom data type, you have to implement the generic interface in a helperclass. 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作這個介面中的自訂資料類型，並提供和方法。The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a custom data type and provide and methods. [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#9)] 實作這個介面之後，您可以使用的序列`ProductA`中的物件方法，如下列範例所示。After you implement this interface, you can use sequences of `ProductA` objects in the method, as shown in the following example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. > [!NOTE] > 如需範例的`GroupBy`，請參閱下列主題。For examples of `GroupBy`, see the following topics. > > - > - > - 方法傳回的集合物件、 一個用於每個發現的相異索引鍵。The method returns a collection of objects, one for each distinct key that was encountered. 是另有其項目相關聯的索引鍵。An is an that also has a key associated with its elements. 根據順序中的項目順序因為都產生物件`source`，產生第一個索引鍵，每個。The objects are yielded in an order based on the order of the elements in `source` that produced the first key of each . 群組中的項目中出現的順序來產生`source`。Elements in a grouping are yielded in the order they appear in `source`. 預設相等比較子用於比較索引鍵。The default equality comparer is used to compare keys. 查詢運算式語法， `group by` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) 或`Group By Into`([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 子句的引動過程轉譯。In query expression syntax, a `group by` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) or `Group By Into` ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) clause translates to an invocation of . 如需詳細資訊和使用範例，請參閱[group 子句](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/group-clause.md)和[群組 By 子句](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/queries/group-by-clause.md)。For more information and usage examples, see [group clause](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/group-clause.md) and [Group By Clause](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/queries/group-by-clause.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. > [!NOTE] > 如需範例的`GroupBy`，請參閱下列主題。For examples of `GroupBy`, see the following topics. > > - > - > - 方法傳回的集合物件、 一個用於每個發現的相異索引鍵。The method returns a collection of objects, one for each distinct key that was encountered. 是另有其項目相關聯的索引鍵。An is an that also has a key associated with its elements. 根據順序中的項目順序因為都產生物件`source`，產生第一個索引鍵，每個。The objects are yielded in an order based on the order of the elements in `source` that produced the first key of each . 群組中的項目中出現的順序來產生`source`。Elements in a grouping are yielded in the order they appear in `source`. 如果`comparer`是`null`的預設相等比較子用於比較索引鍵。If `comparer` is `null`, the default equality comparer is used to compare keys. 如果兩個索引鍵會被視為相等根據`comparer`，第一個索引鍵會被選為該群組的索引鍵。If two keys are considered equal according to `comparer`, the first key is chosen as the key for that grouping. 查詢運算式語法， `group by` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) 或`Group By Into`([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 子句的引動過程轉譯。In query expression syntax, a `group by` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) or `Group By Into` ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) clause translates to an invocation of . 如需詳細資訊和使用範例，請參閱[group 子句](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/group-clause.md)和[群組 By 子句](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/queries/group-by-clause.md)。For more information and usage examples, see [group clause](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/group-clause.md) and [Group By Clause](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/queries/group-by-clause.md).

[!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#122](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#122)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#122](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#122)] > [!NOTE] > 在[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查詢運算式，此項目和索引鍵運算式中發生的相反順序呼叫中引數的位置從方法。In a [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression, the element and key selection expressions occur in the reverse order from their argument positions in a call to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 預設相等比較子， ，用來雜湊和比較索引鍵。The default equality comparer, , is used to hash and compare keys. 產生階層式結果，這表示，項目從`outer`會與集合的相符項目配對`inner`。 produces hierarchical results, which means that elements from `outer` are paired with collections of matching elements from `inner`. `GroupJoin` 可讓您提供完整的相符項目，每個項目設定的基礎結果`outer`。`GroupJoin` enables you to base your results on a whole set of matches for each element of `outer`. > [!NOTE] > 如果不有任何相互關聯的項目中`inner`給定項目的`outer`，將會是空的相符項目序列，但仍然會出現在結果中。If there are no correlated elements in `inner` for a given element of `outer`, the sequence of matches for that element will be empty but will still appear in the results. `resultSelector`函式會呼叫一次，每個`outer`連同所有集合的項目`inner`符合項目`outer`項目。The `resultSelector` function is called only one time for each `outer` element together with a collection of all the `inner` elements that match the `outer` element. 這不同於方法，在其中結果選取器函式會叫用對包含一個項目從`outer`和一個項目從`inner`。This differs from the method, in which the result selector function is invoked on pairs that contain one element from `outer` and one element from `inner`. `GroupJoin` 保留項目的順序`outer`，和每個項目`outer`，從相符項目的順序`inner`。`GroupJoin` preserves the order of the elements of `outer`, and for each element of `outer`, the order of the matching elements from `inner`. 在傳統的關聯式資料庫詞彙中有沒有直接的對等用法。 has no direct equivalent in traditional relational database terms. 不過，這個方法未實作內部聯結和左方外部聯結的超集。However, this method does implement a superset of inner joins and left outer joins. 這兩種作業可以寫入以群組的聯結。Both of these operations can be written in terms of a grouped join. 請參閱[聯結作業](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107)。See [Join Operations](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107). 查詢運算式語法， `join … into` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) 或`Group Join`([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 子句的引動過程轉譯。In query expression syntax, a `join … into` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) or `Group Join` ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用執行群組的聯結兩個序列。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a grouped join on two sequences. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. A 和 B 的兩個集合的交集會定義為包含所有項目同時出現在 B 中，但沒有其他項目集合。The intersection of two sets A and B is defined as the set that contains all the elements of A that also appear in B, but no other elements. 當這個方法所傳回的物件會列舉會產生不同的項目發生在兩個序列中的出現順序`first`。When the object returned by this method is enumerated, yields distinct elements occurring in both sequences in the order in which they appear in `first`. 預設相等比較子， ，用來比較值之型別的實作泛型介面。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types that implement the generic interface. 若要比較的自訂資料類型，您需要實作這個介面，並提供您自己和類型的方法。To compare a custom data type, you need to implement this interface and provide your own and methods for the type. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用傳回整數的兩個序列的每個出現的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to return the elements that appear in each of two sequences of integers. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#41)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#41)] 如果您想要比較之物件的自訂資料類型的序列，您必須實作協助程式類別中的泛型介面。If you want to compare sequences of objects of a custom data type, you have to implement the generic interface in a helper class. 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作這個介面中的自訂資料類型，並提供和方法。The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a custom data type and provide and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. A 和 B 的兩個集合的交集會定義為包含所有項目同時出現在 B 中，但沒有其他項目集合。The intersection of two sets A and B is defined as the set that contains all the elements of A that also appear in B, but no other elements. 當這個方法所傳回的物件會列舉會產生不同的項目發生在兩個序列中的出現順序`first`。When the object returned by this method is enumerated, yields distinct elements occurring in both sequences in the order in which they appear in `first`. 如果`comparer`是`null`的預設相等比較子， ，用來比較值。If `comparer` is `null`, the default equality comparer, , is used to compare values. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何實作可用於相等比較子方法。The following example shows how to implement an equality comparer that can be used in the method. [!code-csharp[CSLINQCustomComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQCustomComparer/CS/CustomComparer.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CSLINQCustomComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQCustomComparer/VB/CustomComparer.vb#1)] 這個比較子實作之後，您可以使用的序列`Product`中的物件方法，如下列範例所示。After you implement this comparer, you can use sequences of `Product` objects in the method, as shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[CSLINQCustomComparer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQCustomComparer/CS/CustomComparer.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CSLINQCustomComparer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQCustomComparer/VB/CustomComparer.vb#2)] [!code-csharp[CSLINQCustomComparer#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQCustomComparer/CS/CustomComparer.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CSLINQCustomComparer#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQCustomComparer/VB/CustomComparer.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 預設相等比較子， ，用來雜湊和比較索引鍵。The default equality comparer, , is used to hash and compare keys. 聯結是指兩個來源的資訊根據一般的索引鍵的項目相互關聯的作業。A join refers to the operation of correlating the elements of two sources of information based on a common key. 將兩個資訊來源和相符的索引鍵，它們會一起其中一種方法呼叫中的整合。 brings the two information sources and the keys by which they are matched together in one method call. 這不同於使用`SelectMany`，這需要執行相同作業的多個方法呼叫。This differs from the use of `SelectMany`, which requires more than one method call to perform the same operation. 保留項目的順序`outer`，和每個項目，相符項目的順序`inner`。 preserves the order of the elements of `outer`, and for each of these elements, the order of the matching elements of `inner`. 查詢運算式語法， `join` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) 或`Join`([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 子句的引動過程轉譯。In query expression syntax, a `join` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) or `Join` ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) clause translates to an invocation of . 在關聯式資料庫詞彙中，方法會實作內部的等聯結。In relational database terms, the method implements an inner equijoin. 「 內部 」 表示另一個序列中有符合的元素會包含在結果。'Inner' means that only elements that have a match in the other sequence are included in the results. 等聯結 ' 聯結中的索引鍵比較是否相等。An 'equijoin' is a join in which the keys are compared for equality. 左方外部聯結作業有沒有專用的標準查詢運算子，但可使用執行方法。A left outer join operation has no dedicated standard query operator, but can be performed by using the method. 請參閱[聯結作業](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107)。See [Join Operations](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來執行一般的索引鍵為基礎的兩個序列的內部聯結。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform an inner join of two sequences based on a common key. remarks.format: ## Remarks 參考資料和可為 null 類型的預設值是`null`。The default value for reference and nullable types is `null`. 方法不會提供方法來指定預設值。The method does not provide a way to specify a default value. 如果您想要指定預設值以外`default(TSource)`，使用範例 > 一節中所述的方法。If you want to specify a default value other than `default(TSource)`, use the method as described in the Example section. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用上的空陣列。The following code example demonstrates how to use on an empty array. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#45](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#45)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#45](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#45)] 有時候值`default(TSource)`不是您想要使用如果集合不包含任何元素的預設值。Sometimes the value of `default(TSource)` is not the default value that you want to use if the collection contains no elements. 不檢查不必要的預設值的結果，並再將它如有必要變更，您可以改用方法，以指定您想要使用這個集合是空的預設值。Instead of checking the result for the unwanted default value and then changing it if necessary, you can use the method to specify the default value that you want to use if the collection is empty. 然後，呼叫取得最後一個項目。Then, call to obtain the last element. 下列程式碼範例會使用這兩種技術以取得預設值是 1，如果數字的每月天數的集合是空的。The following code example uses both techniques to obtain a default value of 1 if a collection of numeric days of the month is empty. 因為整數的預設值為 0，沒有對應的當月的任何一天，預設值必須被指定為 1。Because the default value for an integer is 0, which does not correspond to any day of the month, the default value must be specified as 1 instead. 查詢完成執行後不想要的預設值會檢查第一個結果變數。The first result variable is checked for the unwanted default value after the query has finished executing. 第二個結果變數透過使用來指定預設值是 1。The second result variable is obtained by using to specify a default value of 1. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用實作比較的值。The method uses the implementation of to compare values. 您可以套用這個方法為任意值的序列，如果您提供的函數， `selector`，之專案的成員`source`成數值的型別，特別是`Nullable`在 C# 或`Nullable(Of Single)`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。You can apply this method to a sequence of arbitrary values if you provide a function, `selector`, that projects the members of `source` into a numeric type, specifically `Nullable` in C# or `Nullable(Of Single)` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查詢運算式語法`Aggregate Into Max()`子句的引動過程轉譯。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, an `Aggregate Into Max()` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來判斷序列中預計值的最大值。The following code example demonstrates how to use to determine the maximum value in a sequence of projected values. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 方法會傳回中的這些元素`source`可以轉換為類型`TResult`。The method returns only those elements in `source` that can be cast to type `TResult`. 如果項目無法轉換為類型，而收到例外狀況`TResult`，使用。To instead receive an exception if an element cannot be cast to type `TResult`, use . 這個方法是可以套用至集合，其中有非參數化的類型，例如的幾個標準查詢運算子方法的其中一個。This method is one of the few standard query operator methods that can be applied to a collection that has a non-parameterized type, such as an . 這是因為擴充類型。This is because extends the type . 無法只套用至為基礎的集合上的參數化類型，但根據非參數化的集合也輸入。 cannot only be applied to collections that are based on the parameterized type, but collections that are based on the non-parameterized type also. 藉由套用到集合中實作，您就可以使用標準查詢運算子來查詢集合。By applying to a collection that implements , you gain the ability to query the collection by using the standard query operators. 例如，如果指定的型別引數來會傳回型別的物件`IEnumerable

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 若要排序序列的項目本身的值，指定 identity 函數 (`x => x`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`Function(x) x`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 的`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `Function(x) x` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) for `keySelector`. 兩種方法定義為延伸類型，這是這個方法的傳回型別。Two methods are defined to extend the type , which is the return type of this method. 這兩種方法，也就是`ThenBy`和`ThenByDescending`，可讓您指定其他排序準則來排序序列。These two methods, namely `ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending`, enable you to specify additional sort criteria to sort a sequence. `ThenBy` 和`ThenByDescending`也會傳回，這表示任何數目的連續呼叫`ThenBy`或`ThenByDescending`才能進行。`ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending` also return an , which means any number of consecutive calls to `ThenBy` or `ThenByDescending` can be made. > [!NOTE] > 因為繼承自，您可以呼叫或呼叫的結果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 如此一來，引進了新的主要排序略過先前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 這個方法會使用預設比較子來比較索引鍵。This method compares keys by using the default comparer . 這個方法會執行穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目索引鍵相等，會保留項目的順序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 相反地，不穩定的排序不會保留具有相同索引鍵的項目的順序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. 查詢運算式語法， `orderby` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) 或`Order By`([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 子句的引動過程轉譯。In query expression syntax, an `orderby` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) or `Order By` ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用排序序列的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to sort the elements of a sequence. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#70)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 若要排序序列的項目本身的值，指定 identity 函數 (`x => x`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`Function(x) x`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 的`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `Function(x) x` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) for `keySelector`. 兩種方法定義為延伸類型，這是這個方法的傳回型別。Two methods are defined to extend the type , which is the return type of this method. 這兩種方法，也就是`ThenBy`和`ThenByDescending`，可讓您指定其他排序準則來排序序列。These two methods, namely `ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending`, enable you to specify additional sort criteria to sort a sequence. `ThenBy` 和`ThenByDescending`也會傳回，這表示任何數目的連續呼叫`ThenBy`或`ThenByDescending`才能進行。`ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending` also return an , which means any number of consecutive calls to `ThenBy` or `ThenByDescending` can be made. > [!NOTE] > 因為繼承自，您可以呼叫或呼叫的結果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 如此一來，引進了新的主要排序略過先前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 如果`comparer`是`null`，預設的比較子用於比較索引鍵。If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer is used to compare keys. 這個方法會執行穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目索引鍵相等，會保留項目的順序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 相反地，不穩定的排序不會保留具有相同索引鍵的項目的順序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 若要排序序列的項目本身的值，指定 identity 函數 (`x => x`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`Function(x) x`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 的`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `Function(x) x` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) for `keySelector`. 兩種方法定義為延伸類型，這是這個方法的傳回型別。Two methods are defined to extend the type , which is the return type of this method. 這兩種方法，也就是`ThenBy`和`ThenByDescending`，可讓您指定其他排序準則來排序序列。These two methods, namely `ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending`, enable you to specify additional sort criteria to sort a sequence. `ThenBy` 和`ThenByDescending`也會傳回，這表示任何數目的連續呼叫`ThenBy`或`ThenByDescending`才能進行。`ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending` also return an , which means any number of consecutive calls to `ThenBy` or `ThenByDescending` can be made. > [!NOTE] > 因為繼承自，您可以呼叫或呼叫的結果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 如此一來，引進了新的主要排序略過先前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 如果`comparer`是`null`，預設的比較子用於比較索引鍵。If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer is used to compare keys. 這個方法會執行穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目索引鍵相等，會保留項目的順序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 相反地，不穩定的排序不會保留具有相同索引鍵的項目的順序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用排序序列中使用的轉換函式和自訂比較子，依遞減順序的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to sort the elements of a sequence in descending order by using a transform function and a custom comparer. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 第一個引數`selector`代表要處理的項目。The first argument to `selector` represents the element to process. 第二個引數`selector`表示來源序列中項目的以零為起始的索引。The second argument to `selector` represents the zero-based index of that element in the source sequence. 如果項目是以已知的順序排列，而且您想要運用特定的索引處的項目，例如，這可能會很有用。This can be useful if the elements are in a known order and you want to do something with an element at a particular index, for example. 可能也很有用如果您想要擷取的一或多個項目索引。It can also be useful if you want to retrieve the index of one or more elements. 此投影方法需要轉換函式`selector`，產生一個在來源序列，每個值的值`source`。This projection method requires the transform function, `selector`, to produce one value for each value in the source sequence, `source`. 如果`selector`本身就是集合的值傳回，負責決定是否要以手動方式周遊子取用者。If `selector` returns a value that is itself a collection, it is up to the consumer to traverse the subsequences manually. 在這種情況下，可能更適合您的查詢來傳回單一值的聯合的序列。In such a situation, it might be better for your query to return a single coalesced sequence of values. 若要達成此目的，使用方法，而非。To achieve this, use the method instead of . 雖然`SelectMany`運作方式類似`Select`，它不同，因為轉換函式傳回一個集合，然後展開`SelectMany`傳回之前。Although `SelectMany` works similarly to `Select`, it differs in that the transform function returns a collection that is then expanded by `SelectMany` before it is returned. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 方法列舉輸入的序列中，使用轉換函式對應至每個項目，然後列舉，並產生每個這類元素物件。The method enumerates the input sequence, uses a transform function to map each element to an , and then enumerates and yields the elements of each such object. 也就是說，每個項目`source`，`selector`叫用，而且會傳回值的序列。That is, for each element of `source`, `selector` is invoked and a sequence of values is returned. 然後會壓平合併成一維集合的這個二維集合並將它傳回。 then flattens this two-dimensional collection of collections into a one-dimensional and returns it. 比方說，如果查詢使用取得訂單 (型別`Order`) 資料庫中每位客戶，則結果會是類型`IEnumerable`在 C# then enumerates and yields the elements of each such object. 也就是說，每個項目`source`，`selector`叫用，而且會傳回值的序列。That is, for each element of `source`, `selector` is invoked and a sequence of values is returned. 第二個引數`selector`表示來源序列中項目的以零為起始的索引。The second argument to `selector` represents the zero-based index of that element in the source sequence. 如果項目是以已知的順序排列，而且您想要運用特定的索引處的項目，例如，這可能會很有用。This can be useful remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 方法時，您必須保留的項目`source`呼叫之後，就會發生的查詢邏輯的範圍內。The method is useful when you have to keep the elements of `source` in scope for query logic that occurs after the call to . 如需程式碼範例，請參閱＜範例＞一節。See the Example section for a code example. 如果類型的物件之間沒有雙向關聯性`TSource`和類型的物件`TCollection`，也就是如果型別的物件`TCollection`提供屬性，以擷取`TSource`，產生的物件不需要這多載。If there is a bidirectional relationship between objects of type `TSource` and objects of type `TCollection`, that is, if an object of type `TCollection` provides a property to retrieve the `TSource` object that produced it, you do not need this overload of . 相反地，您可以使用然後瀏覽回`TSource`物件透過`TCollection`物件。Instead, you can use and navigate back to the `TSource` object through the `TCollection` object. 在查詢運算式語法中，每個`from`子句 ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) 或`From`子句 ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 其中一個將轉譯之後的引動過程。In query expression syntax, each `from` clause ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) or `From` clause ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) after the initial one translates to an invocation of . ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 參考資料和可為 null 類型的預設值是`null`。The default value for reference and nullable types is `null`. 方法不會提供方法來指定預設值。The method does not provide a way to specify a default value. 如果您想要指定預設值以外`default(TSource)`，使用範例 > 一節中所述的方法。If you want to specify a default value other than `default(TSource)`, use the method as described in the Example section. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用選取陣列中的唯一項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to select the only element of an array. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#83](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#83)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#83](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#83)] 下列程式碼範例會示範序列不包含剛好只有一個項目時，傳回預設值。The following code example demonstrates that returns a default value when the sequence does not contain exactly one element. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#84](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#84)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#84](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#84)] 有時候值`default(TSource)`不是您想要使用如果集合不包含任何元素的預設值。Sometimes the value of `default(TSource)` is not the default value that you want to use if the collection contains no elements. 不檢查不必要的預設值的結果，並再將它如有必要變更，您可以改用方法，以指定您想要使用這個集合是空的預設值。Instead of checking the result for the unwanted default value and then changing it if necessary, you can use the method to specify the default value that you want to use if the collection is empty. 然後，呼叫若要取得的項目。Then, call to obtain the element. 下列程式碼範例會使用這兩種技術以取得預設值是 1，如果是空的頁面數字集合。The following code example uses both techniques to obtain a default value of 1 if a collection of page numbers is empty. 因為整數的預設值為 0，但通常並不正確的頁碼，預設值必須被指定為 1。Because the default value for an integer is 0, which is not usually a valid page number, the default value must be specified as 1 instead. 查詢完成執行後不想要的預設值會檢查第一個結果變數。The first result variable is checked for the unwanted default value after the query has finished executing. 第二個結果變數透過使用來指定預設值是 1。The second result variable is obtained by using to specify a default value of 1. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 如果`source`包含少於`count`項目、 空白傳回。If `source` contains fewer than `count` elements, an empty is returned. 如果`count`小於或等於零的所有項目`source`來產生。If `count` is less than or equal to zero, all elements of `source` are yielded. 和方法都是功能的補充。The and methods are functional complements. 指定序列`coll`和整數`n`，串連的結果`coll.Take(n)`和`coll.Skip(n)`會產生相同的順序為`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and an integer `n`, concatenating the results of `coll.Take(n)` and `coll.Skip(n)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查詢運算式語法`Skip`子句的引動過程轉譯。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, a `Skip` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來略過指定的已排序陣列中的項目數，並傳回其餘項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to skip a specified number of elements in a sorted array and return the remaining elements. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#87](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#87)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#87](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#87)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用延後的執行來實作。The method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 這個方法會測試每個項目`source`使用`predicate`並略過的項目，如果結果為`true`。This method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and skips the element if the result is `true`. 述詞函式傳回之後`false`的項目，該項目並在其餘的項目`source`因為都產生的任何多個引動過程而`predicate`。After the predicate function returns `false` for an element, that element and the remaining elements in `source` are yielded and there are no more invocations of `predicate`. 如果`predicate`傳回`true`空序列中的所有項目的傳回。If `predicate` returns `true` for all elements in the sequence, an empty is returned. 和方法都是功能的補充。The and methods are functional complements. 指定序列`coll`純虛擬函式和`p`，串連的結果`coll.TakeWhile(p)`和`coll.SkipWhile(p)`會產生相同的順序為`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查詢運算式語法`Skip While`子句的引動過程轉譯。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, a `Skip While` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用條件為 true 時，略過的陣列項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to skip elements of an array as long as a condition is true. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#88](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#88)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#88](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#88)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 方法會測試每個項目`source`使用`predicate`並略過的項目，如果結果為`true`。The method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and skips the element if the result is `true`. 述詞函式傳回之後`false`的項目，該項目並在其餘的項目`source`因為都產生的任何多個引動過程而`predicate`。After the predicate function returns `false` for an element, that element and the remaining elements in `source` are yielded and there are no more invocations of `predicate`. 如果`predicate`傳回`true`空序列中的所有項目的傳回。If `predicate` returns `true` for all elements in the sequence, an empty is returned. 第一個引數`predicate`表示若要測試的項目。The first argument of `predicate` represents the element to test. 第二個引數代表內元素的以零為起始的索引`source`。The second argument represents the zero-based index of the element within `source`. 和方法都是功能的補充。The and methods are functional complements. 指定序列`coll`純虛擬函式和`p`，串連的結果`coll.TakeWhile(p)`和`coll.SkipWhile(p)`會產生相同的順序為`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查詢運算式語法`Skip While`子句的引動過程轉譯。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, a `Skip While` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用取決於項目的索引條件為 true 時，略過的陣列項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to skip elements of an array as long as a condition that depends on the element's index is true. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#89](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#89)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#89](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#89)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 列舉`source`並產生項目，直到`count`已產生的項目或`source`未包含多個項目。 enumerates `source` and yields elements until `count` elements have been yielded or `source` contains no more elements. 如果`count`超過中的項目數`source`的所有項目`source`會傳回。If `count` exceeds the number of elements in `source`, all elements of `source` are returned. 如果`count`小於或等於零，`source`不是列舉，空的傳回。If `count` is less than or equal to zero, `source` is not enumerated and an empty is returned. 和方法都是功能的補充。The and methods are functional complements. 指定序列`coll`和整數`n`，串連的結果`coll.Take(n)`和`coll.Skip(n)`會產生相同的順序為`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and an integer `n`, concatenating the results of `coll.Take(n)` and `coll.Skip(n)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查詢運算式語法`Take`子句的引動過程轉譯。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, a `Take` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用從序列開頭傳回項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to return elements from the start of a sequence. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 方法會測試每個項目`source`使用`predicate`並產生項目，如果結果為`true`。The method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and yields the element if the result is `true`. 述詞函式傳回時，就會停止列舉`false`的項目或當`source`未包含多個項目。Enumeration stops when the predicate function returns `false` for an element or when `source` contains no more elements. 和方法都是功能的補充。The and methods are functional complements. 指定序列`coll`純虛擬函式和`p`，串連的結果`coll.TakeWhile(p)`和`coll.SkipWhile(p)`會產生相同的順序為`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查詢運算式語法`Take While`子句的引動過程轉譯。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, a `Take While` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用條件為 true 時，從序列開頭傳回項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to return elements from the start of a sequence as long as a condition is true. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 方法會測試每個項目`source`使用`predicate`並產生項目，如果結果為`true`。The method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and yields the element if the result is `true`. 述詞函式傳回時，就會停止列舉`false`的項目或當`source`未包含多個項目。Enumeration stops when the predicate function returns `false` for an element or when `source` contains no more elements. 第一個引數`predicate`表示若要測試的項目。The first argument of `predicate` represents the element to test. 第二個引數代表內元素的以零為起始的索引`source`。The second argument represents the zero-based index of the element within `source`. 和方法都是功能的補充。The and methods are functional complements. 指定序列`coll`純虛擬函式和`p`，串連的結果`coll.TakeWhile(p)`和`coll.SkipWhile(p)`會產生相同的順序為`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查詢運算式語法`Take While`子句的引動過程轉譯。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, a `Take While` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用，只要使用的項目索引的條件為 true，從序列開頭傳回項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to return elements from the start of a sequence as long as a condition that uses the element's index is true. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 若要排序序列的項目本身的值，指定 identity 函數 (`x => x`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`Function(x) x`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 的`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `Function(x) x` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) for `keySelector`. 和定義為延伸類型，這也是一種方法的傳回型別。 and are defined to extend the type , which is also the return type of these methods. 此設計可讓您藉由套用任意數目的指定多個排序條件或方法。This design enables you to specify multiple sort criteria by applying any number of or methods. > [!NOTE] > 因為繼承自，您可以呼叫或呼叫的結果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 如此一來，引進了新的主要排序略過先前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 這個方法會使用預設比較子來比較索引鍵。This method compares keys by using the default comparer . 這個方法會執行穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目索引鍵相等，會保留項目的順序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 相反地，不穩定的排序不會保留具有相同索引鍵的項目的順序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. 查詢運算式語法， `orderby [first criterion], [second criterion]` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) 或`Order By [first criterion], [second criterion]`([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 子句的引動過程轉譯。In query expression syntax, an `orderby [first criterion], [second criterion]` ([!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]) or `Order By [first criterion], [second criterion]` ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用執行次要排序序列中的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a secondary ordering of the elements in a sequence. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#102)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#102)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 若要排序序列的項目本身的值，指定 identity 函數 (`x => x`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`Function(x) x`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 的`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `Function(x) x` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) for `keySelector`. 和定義為延伸類型，這也是一種方法的傳回型別。 and are defined to extend the type , which is also the return type of these methods. 此設計可讓您藉由套用任意數目的指定多個排序條件或方法。This design enables you to specify multiple sort criteria by applying any number of or methods. > [!NOTE] > 因為繼承自，您可以呼叫或呼叫的結果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 如此一來，引進了新的主要排序略過先前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 如果`comparer`是`null`，預設的比較子用於比較索引鍵。If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer is used to compare keys. 這個方法會執行穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目索引鍵相等，會保留項目的順序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 相反地，不穩定的排序不會保留具有相同索引鍵的項目的順序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 若要排序序列的項目本身的值，指定 identity 函數 (`x => x`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`Function(x) x`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 的`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `Function(x) x` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) for `keySelector`. 和定義為延伸類型，這也是一種方法的傳回型別。 and are defined to extend the type , which is also the return type of these methods. 此設計可讓您藉由套用任意數目的指定多個排序條件或方法。This design enables you to specify multiple sort criteria by applying any number of or methods. > [!NOTE] > 因為繼承自，您可以呼叫或呼叫的結果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 如此一來，引進了新的主要排序略過先前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 此排序方法會使用預設比較子來比較索引鍵。This sorting method compares keys by using the default comparer . 這個方法會執行穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目索引鍵相等，會保留項目的順序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 相反地，不穩定的排序不會保留具有相同索引鍵的項目的順序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. 在[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]查詢運算式語法`orderby [first criterion], [second criterion] descending`子句的引動過程轉譯。In [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] query expression syntax, an `orderby [first criterion], [second criterion] descending` clause translates to an invocation of . 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]查詢運算式語法`Order By [first criterion], [second criterion] Descending`子句的引動過程轉譯。In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] query expression syntax, an `Order By [first criterion], [second criterion] Descending` clause translates to an invocation of .

that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 相反地，不穩定的排序不會保留具有相同索引鍵的項目的順序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用執行次要排序序列中使用自訂比較子，依遞減順序中的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a secondary ordering of the elements in a sequence in descending order by using a custom comparer. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 這個方法傳回集合中排除重複項目。This method excludes duplicates from the return set. 這是以不同的行為方法，包括重複項目輸入序列中傳回的所有項目。This is different behavior to the method, which returns all the elements in the input sequences including duplicates. 預設相等比較子， ，用來比較值之型別的實作泛型介面。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types that implement the generic interface. 若要比較的自訂資料類型，您需要實作這個介面，並提供您自己和類型的方法。To compare a custom data type, you need to implement this interface and provide your own and methods for the type. 當這個方法所傳回的物件會列舉列舉`first`和`second`的順序並產生已產生每個項目。When the object returned by this method is enumerated, enumerates `first` and `second` in that order and yields each element that has not already been yielded. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用取得兩個整數的序列的聯集。The following code example demonstrates how to use to obtain the union of two sequences of integers. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#109](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#109)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#109](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#109)] 如果您想要比較之物件的自訂資料類型的序列，您必須實作helperclass 中的泛型介面。If you want to compare sequences of objects of a custom data type, you have to implement the generic interface in a helperclass. 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作這個介面中的自訂資料類型，並提供和方法。The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a custom data type and provide and methods. [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#9)] 實作這個介面之後，您可以使用的序列`ProductA`中的物件方法，如下列範例所示。After you implement this interface, you can use sequences of `ProductA` objects in the method, as shown in the following example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個方法是使用延後的執行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 立即傳回值是儲存才能執行此動作的所有資訊的物件。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 這個方法所表示的查詢不會執行直到列舉物件藉由呼叫其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或使用`foreach`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]或`For Each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] or `For Each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. 方法會將合併的第一個序列的每個項目，與具有相同的索引，第二個序列中的項目。The method merges each element of the first sequence with an element that has the same index in the second sequence. 如果序列沒有相同數目的項目，方法會將序列，直到達到其中一個的結尾。If the sequences do not have the same number of elements, the method merges sequences until it reaches the end of one of them. 例如，如果一個序列的方式有三項目，另一個有四個結果序列必須只有三個項目。For example, if one sequence has three elements and the other one has four, the result sequence will have only three elements. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來合併兩個序列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to merge two sequences.
